remarks:
A relation is included in the Cartesian product of its domain and range.  Exercise 4.12(t) of [Mendelson] p. 235.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.) 

---

 A relation is included in the cross product of its domain and range. Exercise 4.12(t) of [Mendelson] p. 235.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.)
statement: relssdmrn $p |- ( Rel A -> A C_ ( dom A X. ran A ) ) $.
